lead_paragraph: For all boxers, but for Floyd Mayweather Jr. especially, hands hold the ultimate importance. If not for Rafael Garcia, Mayweather might have retired.
snippet: For all boxers, but for Floyd Mayweather Jr. especially, hands hold the ultimate importance. If not for Rafael Garcia, Mayweather might have retired.

headline.main: Mayweather’s Hands Stay Wrapped in Trust
headline.seo: Mayweather’s Hand Specialist Has Six Decades of Experience
headline.print_headline: Mayweather’s Hands Stay Wrapped in Trust
